name: DhabaVille
description:
Made for BYOG (2010-2021)

Theme - Minimal Interaction

Run a full-fledged dhaba only with 2 choices- Yes/No. 

The power of your choices can take your business to the skies or burn it to the ground. Play Wisely.

Made this for my first-ever gamejam along with my partner -

https://methpanda.itch.io/

Hope you enjoy the game :D
